message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $900,000 significantly undervalues the product's true worth and potential.  I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This offer reflects the value I know this product holds.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,050,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
